item.title: Audio and Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
View 4 Zoom recordings (approximately 5 hours in total). Create a simple intro + outro to capture the concept of the program.

Budget: $235
Posted On: June 22, 2024 10:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
